application_title.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

application_description.message: Chrome extension that shows the current time and weather
application_description.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

error_localization_user_denied.message: User denied the request for Geolocation.
error_localization_user_denied.description: The user denied permission for the application to use Geolocation

error_localization_location_unavailable.message: Location information is unavailable at this time.
error_localization_location_unavailable.description: The application isn't currently able to get location information.

error_localization_timeout.message: System timed out while seeking location information.
error_localization_timeout.description: The application request for location information exceeded the wait time limit.

error_localization_generic.message: An unknown error occurred while attempting to gather location information.
error_localization_generic.description: The application request for location information failed for an unknown reason.

error_invalid_setting_option.description: There was an attempt to change a setting to an invalid value.

error_invalid_setting.description: There was an attempt to change a setting that shouldn't exist.

location_instructions.message: Enter zip code or leave blank to detect automatically
